# Full-Stack & Product Development Timeline

This document outlines the key dates and milestones related to the development of the **Meeting Ops** application.

- **July 23, 2025:**
  - **Milestone:** Initial Meeting Ops application architecture designed.
  - **Details:** Frontend React + TypeScript, Backend FastAPI, designed for headless appliance deployment.

- **July 29, 2025:**
  - **Milestone:** Core infrastructure implementation begins.
  - **Details:** PostgreSQL, Redis integration. Initial authentication system with JWT tokens.

- **August 1, 2025:**
  - **Milestone:** Backend restoration with minimal Python implementation.
  - **Details:** Created working backend using only Python built-in modules when pip/venv unavailable.

- **August 3, 2025:**
  - **Milestone:** NPU integration complete, project reaches **95% feature completion**.
  - **Details:** Custom NPU runtime integrated, all backend APIs operational, WebSocket streaming working.

- **August 4, 2025:**
  - **Milestone:** Full-stack integration with role-based dashboards.
  - **Details:** 5-tier role system (viewer, user, manager, admin, superuser), TypeScript compilation fixed, all 17+ components connected to real APIs.

- **August 5, 2025:**
  - **Milestone:** PostgreSQL migration and authentication fixes.
  - **Details:** Migrated from SQLite to PostgreSQL, fixed JWT authentication, resolved cross-machine development issues.

- **August 6, 2025:**
  - **Milestone:** Project reaches **95% complete** status.
  - **Details:** All core features implemented, infrastructure complete, awaiting final testing cycle.

- **January 7, 2025:**
  - **Breakthrough:** **100% PRODUCTION READY** with complete deployment stack.
  - **Impact:** HTTPS with Magic Unicorn certificates, Docker Compose orchestration, one-command deployment, server-side recording eliminating browser dependencies.
